course_description: Theory underlying computing concepts, including regular languages, pushdown automata, Turing machines, decidability of problems, time and space complexity and notions of P vs NP and NP-completeness.
prerequisites: CS 326 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 4pm-5:15pm in Math & Science Center - W201
